reviews.text: Whilst this hotel does not pretend to be anything other than a budget option it does offer some things to differentiate it from the pack. It is certainly a step up from the Holiday Inn within a stone's throw.
reviews.title: Clean, comfy but not quite good value

reviews.text: After being in Encore in other locations I was worried about the standard of food for evening meals - they have on occasion been dodgy. Its location does not make it easy to stroll in to town for some other options. The food though here was OK, but the staff could have been a little more attentive. When quiet you really do expect the staff to be aware of empty plates!
reviews.title: Good location, clean

reviews.text: Room was comfy - but I hate the laminate floors. It makes it feel a little institutional.
reviews.title: good modern hotel

reviews.text: We only paid £30 for s one night stay here so can't really complain, the hotel is in a good location for derbys centre. The wet room was great and the hotel was clean.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was by far the worst bed I have ever slept in in a budget hotel with rubbish wafer thin pillows.
reviews.title: Not for coach tours

reviews.text: No in-room WiFi, no iron, uncomfortable pillows. For a hotel in a business park this falls well short on basic needs. The service was okay and there are okay meal options nearby if you don't want to eat in the hotel.
reviews.title: Not for multiple nights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stopped here, and we didn't enjoy the stay at all.
reviews.title: Dirty

reviews.text: Sheets were dirty, only one pillow each provided (and no spare at reception), there was rubbish under the bed, stains in the toilet, the shower was dirty, the table was dusty and when we tried to complain to reception, they fobbed us off by saying they were short staffed.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel with Great Staff

reviews.text: I've stopped at a lot of hotels, and this was one of the worst!
reviews.title: First timers at a Ramada encore

reviews.text: Excellent Hotel
reviews.title: Well located, very friendly staff

reviews.text: Stayed here after MITCAR meet. Hotel was easy to get to, with barrier access. The overall appearance was smart and clean lookin, close to Derby train station, town centre and Pride Park. Room was clean and spacious and the beds were really comfortable. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Ramada Encore, Derby

reviews.text: I stayed here for 2 nights with work and couldn't fault the hotel at all. My room was comfortable and quiet and had everything I needed for a pleasant stay. I made use of the mini gym which was good although not much equipment in there.
reviews.title: Very pleasant stay

reviews.text: Reception staff were friendly and helpful. Location wise -only a 10 minute walk in to the city centre through the station.
reviews.title: Clean, value hotel!

reviews.text: Breakfast was an extra cost but again everything you would want.
reviews.title: Excellent Service!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thought it was great value for money so much so I am going back again next weekend for a leisure stay with my partner where we will explore the peak district.
reviews.title: Could do so much better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on the 1st september - 2nd
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: was very nice, had been at alton towers all day and it was a delight to get into our room get a shower and go to sleep.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.text: was spoitless and service was great,
reviews.title: Stop over for Alton Towers

reviews.text: the only thing i could say was if there was a little card that gave you check out times and times of meals it would be complete.
reviews.title: what is all the fuss about!

reviews.text: Looking for a cheap overnight stop and tired of the alternatives, I tried the Ramada and was impressed with it's clean, comfortable rooms and pleasant staff.
reviews.title: It's definitely a one-night travel hotel
